title: As If He Never Slept
description: Using a benevolent farmer and his animals as a metaphor for God and humankind, author Lynne Bullock demonstrates how God loves and cares for us in all situations, even when we disobey. In As If He Never Slept, children of all ages will learn that God gives us boundaries for our safety and provision. Beautifully illustrated by Amanda Bennett, As If He Never Slept is a keepsake that God will speak through to all ages, tribes and tongues.
author: Lynne Bullock
